DrawingPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
Trida DrawingPanel kresli barevnou mapu s vrstevnicemi, mapa reaguje na kliknuti leveho tlacitka mysi, v miste kliknuti zobtazi bod a jeho nadmorskou vysku
DrawingPanel() - Constructor for class DrawingPanel
Urcuje pocetecni velikost okna, tak aby mela sirku alespon 800px a alespon vysku 600px, pritom zachovava pomer stran
drawPicture(Graphics2D, int, int) - Method in class DrawingPanel
Metoda nakresli obrazek se zachovanim pomeru stran a bilinearni interpolaci
drawPNG(Graphics2D, int, int) - Method in class DrawingPanel
Matoda kresli PNG obrazek
drawSVG(Graphics2D) - Method in class DrawingPanel
Metoda kresli vse v panelu, co je nakresleno vektorovou grafikou
